entries.description: CMS (formerly HCFA)  Common Procedure Coding System
entries.comment: HCPCS: contains codes for medical equipment, injectable drugs, transportation services, and other services not found in CPT4.
Health Care Financing Administration (HCFA) Common Procedure Coding System (HCPCS) including modifiers.[1]
